data.message: When the Butthurt Trump fans say they arnt a fan anymore to try to make a point 😂😂😂 the point of what he said was to make you leave, it worked

replies.message: The real reason to leave is that post-Recovery, Eminem's music is clinical and lacking in energy.
Correction..no Trump fan is butthurt....We have been loving every minute of his presidency. Only ones butthurt are people just like you and the rest of your snowflakes.  Just sayin.
So just becauce they disslike the song theyre trump supporters? Fucking no brainers 😂

We aren't leaving though. We just like seeing you cry babies talk about us in the comments so we'll stick around :)

Ain't getting our money though.

Simon Larsson notice how I said “Butthurt Trump fan” not just trump fans you know the ones that are complaining about how they don’t support him after what he said? Yeah it’s pretty simple to find them just read 😂
Not enough of them by these posts.

Noah Patenaude you don't have to be a fan of trump. Anyone (especially celebrities or washed up rappers) who tell people to go fuck themselves over a political difference, is a bitch. plain and simple.
